channel.title: Claws dont work
channel.description:
Since a week i've been figuring out how PI works, I already figured out most things.
But there are a few things which I couldnt fix; Prayers and Dragon claws.
Prayers do not work, NONE! protect doesnt work, ancient curses do not work, protect item does WORK. Any solution on this? I've been checking out NPCHandler.java for a while, prayer.java etc. No succes.
And my other problem is; Dragon claws. The PI client doesnt seem to have the emote + GFX for the dragon claws, the model of the claws works. I've added special, I can see the bar but when I click on it while attacking a NPC it does nothing.
Help please?

item.title: Claws dont work
item.dc:creator: @KushScape KushScape
item.description:
@KushScape wrote:

no fixes yet ay

item.title: Claws dont work
item.dc:creator: @erde0 erde0
item.description:
@erde0 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:9, topic:365539”][quote author=erde0 link=topic=461740.msg3377880#msg3377880 date=1287788649]
DELTA ALERT OMG!

We’re using PI (which is lovely and MUCH cleaner than DELTA), so that means your tutorial has no affect and would completely F up our source.
[/quote]Be nice and kind to the ones who try to help. They take the time of their life which will never come back to help you, and you offend them? I find that rude and no one will help you if you do that.

P.S I worked with delta for more than 8 months and I like it much better then PI. Dont judge things you never tried.[/quote]
I also used Delta for months, I really enjoyed it then hopped to 562. And took a break for a long time and hopped to PI.
I’m not trying to be rude.

Read full topic
